original_text: If you then, who are evil, know how to give good gifts to your children, how much more will the heavenly Father give the Holy Spirit to those who ask him!”
korean_text: 너희가 악할지라도 좋은 것을 자식에게 줄 줄 알거든 하물며 너희 하늘 아버지께서 구하는 자에게 성령을 주시지 않겠느냐 하시니라

sentences.original_text: know how to give good gifts to your children,
sentences.korean_translation: 자기 아들에게 좋은 것을 줄 줄 알거든,

sentences.original_text: how much more will the heavenly Father give
sentences.korean_translation: 하늘에 계신 아버지께서는 얼마나 더 주시겠느냐

sentences.original_text: the Holy Spirit to those who ask him!”
